data.title: Michael Wolff
data.text: MICHAEL WOLFF, author, columnist and contributor to USA Today, The Hollywood Reporter, and British GQ is one of the most prominent journalists and pundits in the nation. He has written numerous bestselling books, including Fire and Fury: Inside The Trump White House; Television Is The New Television; The Man Who Owns the News: Inside the Secret World of Rupert Murdoch, Autumn of the Moguls; and Burn Rate: How I Survived the Gold Rush Years on the Internet. He appears often on the lecture circuit, and is a frequent guest on network and cable news shows.
